So zed has been forgotten in the pro series a long time ago has become somewhat of a legend of a villain that once was but never again will be ....
he went through world and every copetition owards being picked or banned 0 times!
He lost all his purpose in season 6 after he got every single spell nerfed 1 by 1 here is all the details :
-patch 6.3 R deathmark 30/40/50% of damage taken ? 25/35/45% of damage taken whick is a 5% decrease at all ranks when it requires you do a lot of damage anyway to be effective
-patch 6.7 W living shadow COOLDOWN: 18/17/16/15/14 seconds ? 22/20/18/16/14 seconds which means zed can only apply pressure in more than 1 3rd of a miniute when others have cc and damage on a much lower cooldown i.e lb W katarina jump 
PASSIVE BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE: 5/10/15/20/25% ? 4/8/12/16/20% non relevant now but still an other 5% overall decrease.
-patch 6.8 : Zed no longer gains 20 extra attack damage when activating W - Living Shadow ouch 20 damage less aw.
-patch 6.11 the worst of them all : Q spell razor shiriken DAMAGE: 75/115/155/195/235 ? 70/105/140/175/210 this is an over all loss of 25 base damage being the worst zed nerf of all time.
RATIO: 1.0 bonus attack damage ? 0.9 bonus attack damage this is a 10 % overall decrease in damage
DAMAGE PER ADDITIONAL SHURIKEN: 50% ? 75% and this means only when a shadow is up you will benefit from a tiny boost but is still a draw bacl on the damage when it is a skill shot 2 to be correct and others such as ahri for example have true damage more range and true damge if double tap q spell .
-patch 6.12 made zeds shadows statues insted of shadows! THE SEEN BLADE: Shadows created by W - Living Shadow and R - Death Mark are now marked by a circular team indicator.
and the last yet terrible nerfs, the assassin update :(
-patch 6.22 : W - Living Shadow
REMOVED OVER THE TOP: No longer provides 4/8/12/16/20% bonus attack damage so whats the point of building ad on zed again?
ENERGY RETURN ON MULTI-HIT: 20/25/30/35/40 ? 30/35/40/45/50 irrelevant.
SHADOW SWAP RANGE: 1100 ? 1300 this is nice but irrelevant compared to all the damage lost in pure and percentage damage.
E - Shadow Slash: COOLDOWN: 4 seconds at all ranks ? 5/4.5/4/3.5/3 seconds this ruined zed early game forever .
DAMAGE: 60/90/120/150/180 ? 65/90/115/140/165 this is an overall 15 atk dmg decrease resulting in a terrible mid late game.
- Death Mark: NEW SHADOW REAPING: Whenever Death Mark kills an enemy, Zed steals their shadow for himself, gaining a portion of their attack damage. Zed can only possess one shadow at a time, and only steals a new shadow if it would give him more damage.
REAPING BONUS: 5 attack damage + 5/10/15% of the target’s total attack damage. this requires a full on assassination only benefit at lvl 6 up and has less damage late and mid game then building ad. this means that what zed was so good at playing vs mages is irrelevant (especially in a control mage meta) + going after adcarry's that can just build crit so you get negative agvantage and tops that are tanks!
One last thing how are new players and smurfs meant to benefit from zed's "strengths" without having him with full runes and masteries?
it's is the worst feeling in the world to get zed in a box or buy him for 6300 ip and realize that without full stuff he is an irrelevant champion.
